name: Thunder Gun: Revenge of the Mutants
description: You have a gun that shoots lightning, goddamnit; with it, you will defend Earth against formidable mutant enemies until rainstorms render it inoperable, forcing you to use conventional weapons until the skies clear.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Celeron 900 @ 2.2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Storage: 75 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires an active internet connection to rank on the Leaderboards
